text:
NEWS

'Ignorance Is Bliss': Kelly Ripa Says She Would Reconsider EVER Co-Hosting 'Live' With Regis Philbin After Show Drama

Kelly Ripa is continuing to shed light on her feud with the late Regis Philbin despite criticism, revealing she wouldn't have done 'Live' with him in hindsight due to the drama.
title: Radar Online

meta_data.description: More Information and news about Kelly Ripa
